projects.name: RCCG Banner of Love Parish Website Project
projects.description: Led the development of the official website for RCCG Banner of Love Parish, a community church in Lagos. The project involved designing and implementing a user-friendly and visually appealing platform.

projects.name: Audrasia Retail
projects.description: A retail platform that allows users to purchase products online. The platform features a user-friendly interface, product catalog, and secure payment gateway.

projects.name: Paystack SDK (Edge)
projects.description: Paystack SDK written in Typescript for development on edge and serverless servers.

projects.name: Servex
projects.description: A high-performance, extensible HTTP server framework inspired by Express, Hono, and Fastify. It aims to deliver blazing speed, rock-solid reliability, and effortless elegance for modern web applications.

projects.name: My Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio that houses some of the projects I have worked on, built with JavaScript and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Personal Blog (2023)
projects.description: A personal blogging website built with Sveltekit, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS. The app fetches data from an external source and allows for tailored data presentation.

projects.name: REST Country API (Frontend Mentor)
projects.description: A frontend project built with Tailwind, React, and RC Extended for working with React.

projects.name: Doodle Cam
projects.description: A JavaScript-based camera web application that allows users to take pictures, apply filters, and draw on their photos using a simple and intuitive interface.

projects.name: Rick and Morty DB
projects.description: A web application that fetches data from the Rick and Morty API and displays it in a user-friendly interface. The app allows users to search for characters, view character details, and filter characters by status, species, and gender.

projects.name: My Portfolio (current)
projects.description: An updated version of my portfolio built with SolidJs, Typescript, Tailwind CSS, and Vite.

projects.name: The Ordinary (2023)
projects.description: An online E-commerce platform built with JavaScript and Tailwind CSS.
